content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Hunting expert
This article is about the NPC who sells the Hunter cape. For other uses, see Hunting expert (disambiguation).
Hunting expert
Released21 November 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceHuman
LocationFeldip Hunter area
Sells itemsHunter capes
GenderFemale
OptionsTalk-to
ExamineWith all the furs, I almost mistook her for a wild animal.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID1504

The Hunting expert can be found in the Feldip Hunter area. She resides in a hut marked with a on the world map. There are several ways to get there. She will sell the Hunter cape for 99,000 coins to players who have 99 Hunter.

The clothing she is wearing is larupia clothing, commonly worn by hunters in her area. The Hunting expert is one out of the few Cape of Accomplishment sellers who do not have a specific name. (The others being the Estate Agent, Master Fisher, Head chef and Master Crafter).

She is one of only three female NPCs that sells a cape of accomplishment, the other being Surgeon General Tafani and Twiggy O'Korn.

Stock[edit | edit source]

Note: If a player has multiple 99s, they will receive the trimmed variant of the cape instead.

ItemPrice
sold at
Hunter cape 99,000

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
4 June 2015
(update)

The Hunter Master no longer allows cannons to be setup within her private hunting grounds.

9 April 2015
(update)

The hunter master's chathead now animates correctly.

19 March 2015
(update)

The Hunter expert has collected her Hunting skillcape from the dry cleaners.
